column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I was on a visit to Chicago from the West Coast and got a chance to try the deep dish from Lou Malnati's. It wasn't the best Chicago deep dish I've ever had
column2: but it was definitely memorable! We ordered 'the Lou' and 'the Deluxe'
column3: both really good! I will definitely want to try and stop by again if I'm ever back in town!
